<a id="TileMapPattern"></a>

# TileMapPattern

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Holds a pattern to be copied from or pasted into [TileMap](TileMap.md)\\ s.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This resource holds a set of cells to help bulk manipulations of [TileMap](TileMap.md).

A pattern always starts at the ``(0, 0)`` coordinates and cannot have cells with negative coordinates.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
